entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 4.

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High minus 1 with temperature falling to minus 7 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Local amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 in the morning then light late in the afternoon.
